data.name: Dracula Material Wikipedia
data.description:
Dracula, Material, Minimal

Persistent table of contents, dark colors, material boxes, minimal linking and noise.

For full effect in Firefox, combine with these two other addons:

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/dracula-dark-colorscheme/
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/custom-scrollbars/

To make your scrollbar have the same colors as in the main pic, use:
scrollbar thumb color: #282a36ff
scrollbar track color: #44475aff

data.description: This is an actual adblocker for VidLii, it didn't get approved for VidLii's theme manager so I guess I'll put it here!

data.name: metrika.yandex.ru fix webvisor
APPLE-TUBE (BIG 2020 UPDATE)
data.description: If you're an Apple fanboy you will definitely like this style, because it gives YouTube a more refined touch. This theme adds rounded corners, a better darkmode, blurry backgrounds, shadows and overall a just better looking UI. !!!ONLY USE WITH YOUTUBE DARKMODE ACTIVATED!!! WORKS BETTER WITH CHROME OR OPERA SINCE THERE IS NO OFFICIAL SUPPORT FOR BACKDROP FILTERS IN MOZILLA FIREFOX (Otherwise you won’t have blurry backgrounds, but transparent backgrounds. This doesn’t look very well) IF YOU USE CHROME PLEASE ENABLE THIS FLAG: chrome://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features IF YOU USE OPERA PLEASE ENABLE THIS FLAG: opera://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features Known Issues: - Rainbow Theme: Rainbow Elements are not synchronised

data.description: Minimalistic purple spotify theme with rounded buttons. Screenshot: CLICK HERE! Please send feedback, if you like the theme.

data.name: Baidu Lite Repair 百度轻修复
data.description:
Baidu Lite Repair V1.0.1
修复刚才发现的搜图时UI没有改变的问题。
Safari用户可能需要手动调整.soutu-layer .soutu-url-btn{}处的margin-left值为50px，使得放大镜图标对齐。
（原因是似乎Safari和Chrome的像素值不太一样？很怪。考虑到大多数人用Chrome，先以Chrome的为准。以后考虑增添浏览器选项以适配吧。）

Baidu Lite Repair V1.0.0
修复@pan_cao的百度轻（https://userstyles.org/styles/123858/baidu-lite）由于最近百度UI更新导致的元素错位、部分失效问题。
前言：作者并非专业前端人员，仅自学过一段时间css，因为无法接受百度轻因为百度更新影响导致的界面崩溃，故尝试修改。能力、时间有限，如果出现新的bug请见谅。
由于尚未摸清楚css动画的实现，需要删除百度轻样式中的部分代码：
原百度轻代码内323-409行需要删去,目的是删去放大镜图标的贝塞尔曲线动画。
即.s_btn{}一直到.btnhover{}
